name: LumberJack (Cartraige) (Cartraige)
description: You are a lumberjack with a simple axe but a magical campfire. Which can either heal you or give you immense raged abilities. Constantly choose between power and health in this epic fantasy short survival game. Save as much fire wood as you can because WINTER IS COMING! and so is the Ogre Boss. Survive the winter, and defeat the Ogre Boss to win the game. CHOP CHOP!!
